description: Winter skiing, hiking, biking, and overall adventuring just got a lot more comfortable with Smartwool's Men's Merino 250 Base layers Pattern Bottom. This Smartwool® base layer is always ready for what's ahead and what's next. With a fit updated to improve functionality while enhancing aesthetics for a range of body shapes and a flatlock seam construction designed to minimize chafing, comfort is never in question. Get yourself a pair of Smartwool's best base layer pants and conquer the cold with more confidence than ever.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal (250) Merino Base Layer Pattern Bottoms - Mens
